tasks.intent_template: Create an event called '{summary}' at '{location}' on '{start}' to '{end}' to '{description}'
tasks.reference_action_sequence:
from desktop_env.eval.connectors.gspace.gcalendar import GoogleCalendarService
service = GoogleCalendarService(credential_path='config/credentials.json')
event = service.create_event(start_time='2024-01-05T10:00:00Z', end_time='2024-01-05T11:00:00Z', summary='Meeting with Team', location='Office', description='Discuss project status', attendees=None, calendar_id='primary')
